animeDescription: There lived a tiger in the bamboo forest on the top of the mountain. He went by the name of "Tigger". Tigger the tiger was the Tiger of tigers.He was a lazy fellow always thinking of Nikuman (a dumpling).Then, there came the Hunter. With a bang, he shot and killed the animals. He thought there were no threat to man in the world. But he had come to wake to Tigger, the Wild Tiger!(Source: Official website)
